channel.title: How can i make all quests complete for delta?
channel.description: How would i make all the quests complete for the deltascape source?

item.title: How can i make all quests complete for delta?
item.dc:creator: @FlyingFedora FlyingFedora
item.description:
@FlyingFedora wrote:

  • Mini Post Tutorial -

File’s Used :

[ul][li]player.jar[/li]
[li]compiler[/li][/ul]

Source Tested On :
Deltascape

Purpose :
All quests are finished when you log in.

Step One :
Go into your server folder, and double click onto player.jar.

Now you will find a giant list. Ctrl + F and find “q1”. You will find a fairly long list of “q’s” from 1-11.

Step Two :
Now understand that the quests are in stages. 1 = first bit, 2 = next bit. And so on…

Now for lost city there is 5 parts to it :

[ul][li]Talk to warrior[/li]
[li]Talk to ranger[/li]
[li]Go to entrana and kill ent[/li]
[li]Chop down tree[/li]
[li]Finding shed[/li][/ul]

So if you understand basic “code”, you should understand that the file your in is what a new character looks like when it’s firstly created. So if you want to character to log in with a quest done, change the value of “q1 - 12”. There would be 5 Steps, so the value should be 5 when they log in.

Step 3 :
Go next to q1 ( or what quests you want ) and think. What would you right, just a a rough guess?

Thats right, you add a

= 5

before the ; and a space after the q1. This will make the new character log in already at the fifth step. This may be the last step or the finished thing. So it may be 5 or 6.

Add this to any quests and they should work. Hope i helped.

<3

Read full topic
